title: Team Lead DevOps – Bygg och led vårt växande DevOps-team
description:
Vi söker en erfaren Team Lead som vill ta ansvar för att bygga och utveckla vårt DevOps-team. Det här är en roll för dig som brinner för både teknik och människor, och som ser möjligheten i att forma ett team från grunden samtidigt som du själv är tekniskt aktiv.


Vad du kommer göra
-------------------


Som Team Lead för DevOps får du ett tydligt uppdrag: att bygga ett starkt, växande team som levererar kvalitet till våra kunder. Du kommer ha ansvar för både det dagliga teamarbetet och den strategiska tillväxten.


Konkret innebär det:

* Rekrytera och bygga teamet. Du driver rekryteringsprocessen och ansvarar för att vi hittar rätt kompetens. Vi siktar på att växa med 2-3 personer under 2026, och du leder den processen från kandidatkontakt till onboarding.
* Day-to-day ledarskap där du sköter det operativa ledarskapet: stöttar teamet i uppdrag, löser blockeringar, säkerställer leveranskvalitet och skapar en kultur där folk både trivs och utvecklas.
* Tekniskt konsultande. Du är fortfarande hands-on tekniskt och jobbar med DevOps/SRE-uppdrag tillsammans med teamet eller individuellt på ett uppdrag där du också kan öppna dörrar för fler kollegor.
* Nära samarbete med ledning. Du rapporterar till utvecklingschefen och är med och formar hur vi jobbar framåt. Målet är att du på sikt tar steget till en full chefsroll när teamet är etablerat.


Vad vi jobbar med
------------------


Vårt DevOps-team levererar:

* DevOps och SRE-uppdrag hos kunder inom t.ex. telekom, retail och myndigheter
* Projektleveranser där vi bygger och automatiserar infrastruktur
* CI/CD-pipelines, containerisering, cloud-lösningar
* Infrastruktur som kod


Vi är inne i en expansionsfas och fokuserar på specialisering inom våra teknikområden. Du kommer vara en nyckelspelare i den resan.


Vem du är
----------


Vi tror att du har minst 6-8 års erfarenhet av att jobba med DevOps, SRE eller infrastruktur, och att du är redo att ta steget mot ledarskap.


Du har troligen:

* Jobbat som konsult och trivs med det, men vill nu bygga och leda ett team
* Erfarenhet av någon form av lead-roll, kanske som team lead, tech lead, projektledare eller agil coach
* Rekryterat eller varit delaktig i att bygga team tidigare
* Teknisk akademisk utbildning eller motsvarande erfarenhet


Som person är du:

* Pragmatisk och proaktiv. Du ser vad som behöver göras och tar tag i det
* Strukturerad. Du skapar ordning i kaos och håller koll på både människor och leveranser
* En lagspelare. Du bygger förtroende och får människor att växa
* Tekniskt stark. Du har credd i teamet eftersom du själv kan och gör


Extra plus om du har:

* Erfarenhet som team lead eller chef
* Jobbat i ledningsgrupp eller nära ledning
* Drivit rekryteringsprocesser från början till slut, eller varit med och intervjuat kandidater
* Lite sälj- eller affärsutvecklingserfarenhet


Varför Lemontree?
------------------


Vi är stolta över att vara en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser. Här får du:


Stort inflytande där du är med och formar hur teamet jobbar

* Snabb utveckling och varierande uppdrag, mycket ansvar och tydlig karriärväg mot chefsroll
* Platt organisation, korta beslutsvägar, högt i tak, personligt ledarskap
* Bra villkor, konkurrenskraftiga förmåner och möjlighet att påverka din egen situation
* Stöttande kollegor, en kultur där vi hjälps åt och har kul tillsammans


Vårt kontor ligger i centrala Stockholm, och vi ses gärna där för att bygga team och kultur.

  

Har du frågor? Hör av dig till jenny.freden@lemontree.se


Redo att bygga något?


Vi söker inte någon som "hinner med" rekrytering vid sidan av. Vi söker någon som ser rekrytering och teambyggande som kärnan i uppdraget. Om det låter som dig, välkommen att söka.


Skicka din ansökan idag och bli den som bygger vårt DevOps-team.

title: CICD Engineer
description:
*As a CICD Engineer, you’ll be at the heart of automation, innovation, and continuous delivery : empowering development teams across Tele2. If you're passionate about driving simplicity, speed, and scalability in tech, this is your chance to make a real impact.*
 Are you ready to be at the forefront of digital innovation? Join our dynamic team at Tele2, where Digital Capabilities & Technology (DCT) is the engine behind our products and services. As the essential enabler of our commercial ambitions, DCT brings automation and simplicity to the telecommunications industry, revolutionizing the way we connect and communicate.
   

  

 Within our organization, you’ll find everything from the backbone infrastructure of technology and IT systems, serving both our external & internal customers, to advanced analytics, AI creation, and frontend development. Our team plays a vital role in ensuring reliable and premium services through delivering exceptional experiences to our end customers, both Consumer and Enterprises, all the while supporting our colleagues within Tele2.
   

  

**About The Job**
 As a CICD Engineer, you will be a part of the delivery/operations team. You will focus on building and maintaining an internal service catalogue of the most demanded capabilities by development teams. One of our key offerings is a centralized continuous delivery platform, allowing teams to quickly deploy either virtualized or containerized workloads to production. As well as maintaining and innovating on the platform, you will be offering guidance and support on best practices around continuous delivery.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 To thrive and succeed in this role we believe that you have...
   

  

* At least three years’ experience in the IT industry, either in software development, operations, or similar
* Understanding of Agile software development methodologies
* Knowledge of Continuous Delivery principles and DevOps mindset
* Experience with infrastructure automation tooling (eg. Ansible, Puppet)
* Automation platform experience (eg. Jenkins)
* Experience in scripting languages (eg. bash, groovy, ruby)
* Experience in Docker and Kubernetes
* Proficiency in working in a Linux environment
* Experience in tools like Gitlab, Artifactory, Nexus
* Strong skills in Swedish & English, both written and verbal


**Preferred Qualifications (not Necessary)**
* Experience with major build tools (eg. Maven, NPM, Gradle)
* Experience with monitoring and logging frameworks
* Knowledge of test automation practices and tooling
* Knowledge around release management


 In this role, we look for someone with a can-do mindset who thrives in finding solutions when obstacles occur. Communication and dialogue with the development teams will be crucial, so you should also enjoy building connections with others.
   

  

 At times, our work can be intense, so well-being and cohesion in the group is the highest priority. In addition to formal criteria such as experience and competence, we therefore place great emphasis on your personality.

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
At Ubiquiti Inc., we create technology platforms for Businesses, Smart Homes, and Internet Service Providers, driven by our goal to connect everyone, everywhere by Rethinking IT. To date, Ubiquiti has shipped over 100 million devices worldwide, from ISP networking products to next generation of IT solutions. At Ubiquiti, you’ll heighten your potential and broaden your horizons, while shaping the future of connectivity.
   

  

**We are currently looking for a highly skilled Fullstack Developer to our team in Stockholm, Sweden.**
***Please note that applicants must live in Sweden and hold a valid work permit at the time of application to be considered for this role.***
**Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain highly reliable and scalable web services and UIs that serve millions of users worldwide, for example our platforms UniFi OS, Design Center/InnerSpace, UniFi Network, Accounts or Community
* Collaborate with developers and designers in distributed teams in an agile and fast-paced, international work environment
* Actively participate in projects and voice your ideas and solutions
* Maintain industry-standard programming style and stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends


**Requirements**
* Extensive experience of coding in modern JavaScript, TypeScript, React and Node.js
* Experience of building scalable and high-availability GraphQL/REST APIs and working with SQL databases (Postgres) and key-value stores/message brokers such as Redis
* Solid knowledge about programming, design patterns
* Experience of debugging, profiling and optimising web apps
* Strong sense of ownership of tasks and responsibilities
* Ability to lead yourself and your own work as well as collaborate extensively with others
* Familiar with Git and Jira
* Excellent communication skills and highly proficient in English (written and spoken)


**Nice To Have**
* Skilled in Go and/or Java
* Experience developing AWS cloud services / DevOps
* Good understanding of web protocols, networking protocols, and architectures
* Familiarity with the agile software development processes
* Knowledge of web security (OWASP, browser security model, OAuth)


**Benefits**
* International work environment
* Competitive compensation package including wellness allowance, occupational pension, medical insurance, private health insurance, life insurance and work-injury insurance
* Five weeks of holiday per year
* Flexible work hours and hybrid work model
* Modern office space located in Epicenter (Hötorget)
* Access to all the latest Ubiquiti products and prototypes for home use and tests


***Please note that a background check will be conducted in the final stage of the recruitment process***

title: Senior Cloud Engineer
description:
Avalanche Studios Group is hiring a Senior Cloud Engineer for our central technology organisation, Tech Foundations. In this crossfunctional team we innovate in areas that push the boundaries for what open-world sandbox gaming means as well as enhance our players' online experience within our live-service games.
   

  

**The Position**
 In this role, you will contribute to developing and optimising our backend platform, Apex Connect, and its infrastructure in the cloud. Apex Connect is an integral part of the Apex Engine suite, a robust set of tools and services driving our live-service games. It plays a pivotal role in engaging millions of active players globally, providing essential services such as user authentication, data tracking, live event management, and advanced matchmaking.
   

  

 As a Cloud Engineer, you will be a part of our engineering team, focusing on setting up, operating, and refining our infrastructure in the Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
   

  

**What You'll Do**
* Designing, implementing and maintaining our backend platform infrastructure architecture
* Ensuring that our infrastructure is scalable, secure, performant and cost-efficient
* Leading the transition and expansion of Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
* Improving our CI/CD pipeline to ensure developer experience as well as service stability
* Supporting other members of the team, fostering an inclusive environment of growth and development within Tech Foundations
* Provide technical excellence and problem solving
* Be a champion for cost-efficiently running services in commercial cloud environments
* Be a champion for the scaling of backend infrastructure to meet high availability requirements


**Who You Are**
* 3+ years of professional experience with cloud or hybrid infrastructure (preferably GCP)
* Able to set and explain measurable goals for service quality
* Experience with Redis, Memcache, or equivalent
* Experience working with package management and dependency
* Proficiency with container orchestration technologies such as Kubernetes
* Experience in establishing and maintaining CI/CD pipelines
* Professional experience with one or more of the following programming languages Python, Go or C++
* Experience with Infrastructure as Code tools (Terraform, Ansible, Chef, etc.)
* A solid understanding of software architecture
* Excellent communication skills in English, both written and verbal


**Bonus**
* Hands-on experience with Prometheus, Grafana and Google Cloud Monitoring
* Experience with Cloudflare DNS and Cloudflare DDoS protection products
* A passion and interest in gaming


*Note: Research shows under-represented groups in the industry (especially women) might not apply to a job if they don’t check off every requirement. At Avalanche, we’re more about your drive to learn and interest in tackling challenges than what’s on your resume! So don’t stress if you don’t tick every box— shoot us your application anyway! Diverse opinions and different experiences are what make our teams so great, not itemized lists of qualifications.*
**The Stockholm location**
 Our Stockholm office is situated in Södermalm, the beating heart of the city’s game industry. It’s a physical representation of our games – the lush vegetation of Just Cause and theHunter: Call of the Wild meets corroded metal straight out of Mad Max. It has everything you need to make it your creative base camp.
   

  

**Our values**
 At Avalanche Studios Group, we create worlds beyond limits. But that’s not exclusive to our games, so we’re committed to developing a diverse and inclusive workplace. All Avalanchers have a shared responsibility to create an open work environment where everyone is treated equally and respectfully. Being part of our world is not contingent on your heritage, your gender, or sexual orientation. It’s all about your passion and creativity.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 To apply for this position, please register below and provide your CV in English. We review applications continuously. All further studio-related information is provided under a non-disclosure agreement.
   

  

*At Avalanche Studios Group we're always on the lookout for talented individuals to join our passionate team, but please note that relocation assistance is not available for this role.*

title: Payments Tester
description:
Role - Payments Tester
 



 Location - Stockholm, Sweden (Hybrid)
 



 Type - B2b Contract
 



  





**Job Description:** 



* Help test and maintain critical services and functionality within the super-hot payments area
* Analyse product requirements, technical impacts, system processes and solution designs
* Write unit, functional and end-to-end tests, acceptance criteria, KPI’s and test scenarios to measure the quality of our payment infrastructure
* Take part in non-functional and performance testing to help scale up the environment for large transaction volumes
* Be part of a cross functional agile team in the Payment Execution Agile Release Train that run the SAFe agile framework.
* Work closely and learn from domain experts in payments, architecture and mainframe systems
* Develop yourself, contribute to the development of your team and the entire release train.
* Be part of a dynamic environment with cross functional teams that share challenges and build knowledge together



  





  





 What is needed in this role:
 



  




* Minimum 5 years’ experience from testing and quality assurance of complex software systems
* Knowledge of methods and tools used in software testing
* Experience from banking, finance or insurance industries
* Work experience from the payment domain is an advantage
* Experience from ongoing initiatives such as ISO20022, Bank/plusgiro transformation, SEPA or similar is helpful
* A team player with good collaboration and communication skills
* Experience from agile ways of working, e.g. SAFE, scrum etc
* Ability to communicate with IT and business stakeholders to reach a common understanding of the work that needs to be done
* A driven, proactive, self-organized and an analytical approach with a strive to continuously improve
* Proficient in English, spoken and written, Swedish is a plus

title: Cloud Consultant Azure
description:
**Gå** 
**med i vårt Cloud-team – Flera möjligheter tillgängliga!** 




  





 Är du passionerad kring molntransformation och redo att driva innovation för Orange Business kunder? Vi går nu in i en spännande tillväxtfas med stora ambitioner för vårt Public Cloud Delivery-team. Det här är din chans att bli en del av oss, bidra till att forma vår framtid och vara med på vår resa – vi söker talangfulla medarbetare på alla nivåer!
 



  





  





**Din roll kan innebära att du:** 




  





 ✅ Designar och implementerar skalbara molnlösningar på ledande plattformar
 



 ✅ Bidrar i molnmigrationsprojekt och transformationsinitiativ
 



 ✅ Bygger ramverk för governance och landningszoner
 



 ✅ Deltar i pre-sales och kundworkshops
 



 ✅ Översätter verksamhetskrav till tekniska lösningar
 



  





  





**Vi** 
**söker dig som har:** 




  




* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av arkitektur och implementation i Azure
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med moderna verktyg och ramverk för mjukvaruleverans (CI/CD, DevOps, GitOps, Git, agila metoder)
* Erfarenhet av Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Bicep m.fl.)
* Kännedom om Cloud Adoption Framework (CAF) och Well architected framework (WAF)
* Erfarenhet av molnsäkerhet och nätverk
* Flytande kommunikationsförmåga på både svenska och engelska (tal och skrift)



  





**Meriterande** 
 :
 



  




* Kunskap inom Docker, Kubernetes (AKS)
* Erfarenhet av kostnadsoptimering
* Erfarenhet av Azure Integration Services & serverless-teknologier (Logic App, Function, App Services, Service Bus)



  





  





**Vår teamkultur** 




  





 Om du tycker om att arbeta med ny teknik och hålla din kunskap uppdaterad kommer du passa bra hos oss. Vi arbetar i agila team med en no-blame-kultur där vi uppmuntrar innovation och ger våra medarbetare autonomi att fatta beslut. För oss är det viktigt att ständigt förbättras, arbeta proaktivt och automatisera snarare än att repetera uppgifter.
 



  





 Är du nyfiken på att utvecklas? Vi ser till att våra team alltid ligger steget före genom att ge tid för certifieringar, delta i eller titta på webbinarier, labba självständigt eller helt enkelt diskutera idéer med kollegor.
 



  





  





**Varför ska du välja oss?** 




  




* Flexibelt arbetssätt – hybridlösning med modernt och samarbetsinriktat kontor i Stockholm
* Kontinuerliga lärandemöjligheter och certifieringar
* En kultur utan skuldbeläggning – du får frihet att innovera
* Möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste molnteknologin
* Ett community av experter – som Digital Natives sätter vi innovation i centrum för vår kompetens
* Läs mer om våra förmåner
 
 här.



  





  





**Om Orange Business:** 




  





 Orange Business är ett ledande nätverks- och digitalintegratörsföretag med kontor i 65 länder världen över och en del av Orange-koncernen.
 



  





 Digital Services, en affärsenhet inom Orange Business, är en nybildad division inom Orange Business. I Europa består affärsområdet av cirka 1500 medarbetare fördelade över 10 länder. Vi är digitala natives med innovation i centrum för vår verksamhet, vilket gör oss till en pålitlig partner nära våra kunder. Vårt gemensamma uppdrag är att hjälpa dem att förnya, driva och leda sin digitala transformation och sina affärsstrategier inom viktiga digitala områden, inklusive Cloud, Customer Experience, Digital Workspace samt Data & AI. Som en agil och snabbfotad digital affärspartner erbjuder affärsenheten pålitliga end-to-end-lösningar och produkter som hjälper företag i en rad olika branscher, både inom privat och offentlig sektor, att transformera sin verksamhet, förbättra kundupplevelsen och driva tillväxt.
 



  





 Med vår digitala expertis är vi en strategisk partner till Orange Business mål att vara en ledande nätverks- och digitalintegratör, med vårt team som en viktig tillväxtmotor.
 



  





  





**Rekryteringsprocessen:** 




  





 Vi går igenom ansökningar löpande och strävar efter att hålla intervjuer och samtal allt eftersom vi får in dem.
 



  





 Är du intresserad men känner att du inte uppfyller alla kriterier till 100 %? Vi uppmuntrar dig att söka ändå! Vi tror på styrkan i mångsidiga kompetenser, perspektiv och individers unika kvaliteter. Vi vill att alla ska känna sig fria att vara sig själva – dina unika förmågor kan passa perfekt för vårt team! Din perfekta match kanske är nästa tjänst vi annonserar, så varför inte ligga steget före och söka redan nu?
 



  





 Är du intresserad av att läsa mer om Orange Business? Besök vår
 
 hemsida
 
 eller följ oss på
 
 LinkedIn.

title: LINUX ENGINEER TILL BANKGIROT
description:
*Bankgirot söker en Linux Engineer till en växande del av organisationen i Stockholm.* 
*Bankgirot har en unik position på Sveriges betalmarknad, som just nu genomgår sin största transformation i modern tid.* 
*Vår IT-organisation växer för att utveckla framtidssäkra lösningar som uppfyller internationella standarder och regelverk.
   

  

 Samtidigt säkerställer vi att det nuvarande betalsystemet fungerar stabilt och säkert – varje dag.* 
*Utvecklingen av framtidens betalningsinfrastruktur är i full gång och vi söker dig som vill vara en del av resan. Som
 *Linux* 
 Engineer får du en nyckelroll i att säkra framtidens betalningslösningar på ett teknikbolag där vi brinner för vårt uppdrag – och för varandra.*
 Din roll
   

  

 Det här är en spännande möjlighet för dig som vill vara med och bygga upp en helt ny och modern infrastruktur. Du blir en del av ett växande Linuxteam som just nu formas, där du tillsammans med kollegor och vår Tech Lead får en nyckelroll i att både drifta och vidareutveckla vår nya Greenfield-miljö.
   

  

 Rollen är bred och varierad – du arbetar med allt från daglig drift och felsökning till automatisering, säkerhetshärdning och applikationsdrift. Du får stort ansvar för Linuxplattformen och arbetar proaktivt med att effektivisera miljöer, införa nya lösningar och bidra till hög tillgänglighet och säkerhet. Du får också möjlighet att påverka tekniska vägval, etablera rutiner och vara med och bygga långsiktig kompetens inom området – i en organisation med ett högt säkerhetsfokus och ett samhällsviktigt uppdrag.
   

  

**Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden inkluderar:**
* Driva och vidareutveckla vår nya Linuxinfrastruktur med fokus på tillgänglighet, säkerhet och effektivitet
* Ansvara för drift, underhåll och övervakning av servrar, användare och applikationer
* Utföra felsökning och logganalys för att säkerställa stabil och säker drift
* Automatisera och standardisera miljöer med Bash och Ansible
* Säkerställa korrekt konfiguration, behörigheter och härdning av system
* Hantera applikationsdrift för exempelvis webb- och e-posttjänster i Linuxmiljö


 Vi söker dig som har
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen har du goda kunskaper inom Linuxadministration och är trygg i att hantera drift av servrar, användarhantering och systemresurser. Du har arbetat med felsökning, övervakning och logganalys, och har en god förståelse för hur man bygger stabila, säkra och effektiva miljöer.
   

  

 Skriptning och automatisering är en självklar del av din verktygslåda – gärna med Bash och Ansible – och har du också erfarenhet av att arbeta med virtualiseringslösningar som VMware och Linuxbaserade VDI-miljöer är detta ett plus. Du är noggrann med säkerhet, rättigheter och härdning av system, och du delar gärna med dig av din kunskap och dokumenterar det du bygger.
   

  

 Det är meriterande om du också har erfarenhet av databashantering, ett intresse för DevOps och cloud-native-arkitekturer, eller har arbetat i miljöer med höga krav på tillgänglighet och kontinuitet. Viktigast är att du har ett driv att lära dig och att du vill bidra till att bygga något långsiktigt.
   

  

 Oavsett om du är erfaren eller i början av din Linuxresa söker vi dig som har ett genuint teknikintresse, som gärna labbar på egen hand och som vill förstå systemen på djupet – inte bara få dem att fungera. Här får du möjlighet att växa tillsammans med ett engagerat team som bygger framtidens plattform – på riktigt.
   

  

 Ett utvecklande arbete med bra förmåner
   

  

 Som vår nya kollega blir du en del av ett kompetent och positivt team där vi samarbetar och sätter högt värde på varandras kompetens och erfarenheter.
   

  

 Vi satsar mycket på hälsa och välmående och erbjuder generösa förmåner för dig som medarbetare.
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning baserad i Liljeholmen i Stockholm. Du behöver ha goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska.
   

  

 Innan anställning beslutas genomförs en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585).
   

  

 Intresserad?
   

  

 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Bankgirot med Nexer Recruit.
   

  

 Har du frågor eller funderingar? Kontakta gärna rekryteringskonsult Johanna Värmfors: johanna.varmfors@nexergroup.com eller +46 730 821 230 alternativt Jenny Nilsson: jenny.nilsson@nexergroup.com eller +46 703 018 279.
   

  

 Läs om fler lediga tjänster från Bankgirot här.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Om Bankgirot
   

  

 Bankgirot är ett svenskt clearinghus och teknikbolag med över 60 års erfarenhet av att leverera finansiell infrastruktur till banker. I samverkan med betalsektorn ser vi till att privatpersoner och företag enkelt kan göra överföringar och betalningar.
   

  

 Bankgirot säkerställer att det nuvarande betalsystemet fungerar felfritt, samtidigt som vi utvecklar framtidssäkrade lösningar. Vi säkrar och utvecklar Sveriges betalningar.
   

  

 Läs mer på www.bankgirot.se

title: Solution Architect
description:
*Studies show that women and underrepresented groups often hesitate to apply unless they meet every requirement. At Stegra, we’re building an impact-driven, sustainable company - and we need a diverse, inclusive team to make it happen.*
*If you share our passion but don’t meet every qualification, we encourage you to apply anyway. You might be the perfect fit for this role, or another as we grow.*
*At Stegra, we’re not just building a plant, we’re proving that sustainable industry is possible. And to do that, we need people like you.*
*Join a team where safety comes first. Where we support each other, learn as we go, and make space for everyone to grow and contribute. This is your chance to be part of something big - while being closer to nature and leading a balanced, purposeful life.*
**What You’ll Do**
 Right now, we are looking for a Solution Architect to join our Digital HR and Finance team. In this role, you will report to our Digital Domain Manager and be part of the Digital Enterprise function. You will join a supportive, collaborative environment where we create modern and reliable digital capabilities for our HR and Finance functions.
   

  

 This role is a great fit for you who have several years of experience as a software developer, especially within backend development, and feel ready to grow into a Solution Architect role. At Stegra, you will have the valuable opportunity to develop into the role together with guidance and close collaboration from our Digital Enterprise Architect. We believe that thoughtful architecture grows from people who understand how digital solutions are built, and your development background will be a strong starting point as you take on a broader, more strategic perspective.
   

  

 In this role, you will collaborate closely with colleagues across both business and technical teams. Together, you will explore needs from HR and Finance and turn them into well-designed, future ready technical solutions. Your work will help create architectures that support simplicity, scalability and long-term maintainability.
   

  

 While you will not focus on writing production code every day, you will be involved in defining backend patterns, supporting development teams and helping align our digital solutions with Stegra’s guiding principles.
   

  

**Your day-to-day work will include, but not be limited to:**
* Exploring needs together with HR and Finance teams and shaping them into clear, well-structured technical concepts
* Supporting the creation of backend patterns and solution designs that are scalable, intuitive and aligned with Stegra’s digital principles
* Breaking down broader problem areas into understandable technical building blocks, roadmaps and development tasks
* Collaborating closely with developers to ensure shared understanding of architectural choices and helping teams move forward with confidence
* Contributing to integration approaches, data flow designs and API structures that enable smooth communication between systems
* Ensuring that security, data protection and access control are naturally embedded in the design of every solution
* Working across domains to make sure our technical solutions reflect real business needs and contribute to smooth, intuitive workflows
* Engaging regularly with stakeholders to create shared understanding of needs, decisions and expected outcomes
* Working closely with our Digital Enterprise Architect and learning how architectural decisions connect to the larger enterprise landscape


**What You’ll Bring**
 You are analytical, curious and motivated by creating solutions that work in real life. You enjoy turning complexity into something understandable, and you help others navigate technical decisions with clarity and confidence. You bring a collaborative communication style, and you appreciate environments where people support one another and learn together. You are excited about stepping into a role where you can grow your architectural skills while keeping your technical thinking sharp.
   

  

**Specific to this role, we would like to see that you can tick off a fair amount of the boxes below:**
* A degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering or equivalent experience
* Several years of experience as a backend developer, with curiosity to grow into a broader architectural role
* Experience contributing to the design or improvement of backend solutions, including APIs or microservice-based systems
* Comfort breaking down complex needs into structured, understandable documentation or technical steps
* Experience in a lead, coaching, Scrum Master or similar supporting role within a development team
* A general understanding of frontend, backend and infrastructure perspectives even if your core strength is backend
* Strong communication skills, able to engage across technical and business teams
* Prior experience from stakeholder collaboration, planning or providing technical direction to others
* Knowledge of HR or Finance processes is helpful, but absolutely not required
* Familiarity with architectural frameworks and tools such as ArchiMate or similar is helpful, but absolutely not required


**Benefits At Stegra**
 At Stegra, you’ll join a company where your work has real impact on the climate, the industry, and future generations. We’re building a culture rooted in safety, trust, and inclusion, where people feel supported to grow and thrive.
   

  

**Read More About Benefits At Stegra here.**
**Here’s what makes this role unique:**
 Breadth, not silos: You’ll work across multiple technical areas—backend, architecture, infrastructure, DevOps and Data—gaining deep understanding of our digital ecosystem.
   

  

 Ownership from day one: You’ll support a specific domain and act as a bridge between operations and tech, and drive solutions all the way from need to implementation and iteration.
   

  

 Close to the action: You’ll collaborate closely with stakeholders, understand their workflows, and ensure your digital solutions create real value in their day-to-day operations.
   

  

**This is Stegra**
 Stegra is on a mission to change the global steel industry by producing green hydrogen, iron, and steel - with the goal of eliminating CO₂ emissions. Instead of coal, we use green hydrogen and fossil-free electricity, meaning our primary emissions will be water and heat.
   

  

 By 2030, our ambition is to produce 5 million tonnes of green steel annually in our fully integrated, digitized, and sustainable plant in Boden, Northern Sweden - currently under construction. But this is just the beginning. Our expertise in green hydrogen will enable us to decarbonize industries beyond steel, paving the way for a cleaner future.
   

  

**Our Stockholm Office**
 Our modern Stockholm office is located on Norra Stationsgatan, close to Karolinska University Hospital in central Stockholm. Here, you’ll find a bright, collaborative workspace where cross-functional teams connect, share ideas, and drive progress. Whether you're visiting regularly or working hybrid, you'll be part of a vibrant office culture with easy access to the city’s energy and amenities.
   

  

*Founded in 2020, Stegra (formerly H2 Green Steel) was created with the purpose to decarbonize hard-to-abate industry. Construction of our first project – an integrated plant producing green hydrogen, green iron and green steel – is well underway in Boden, Sweden. Slashing emissions using green hydrogen and renewable electricity, we’re starting a clean industrial revolution. Steel is just the beginning.
   

  

 We are building a diverse and rapidly growing team spread across our site and offices in Boden and Stockholm, targeting close to 1500 employees by the end of 2025. Together, we focus on delivering green impact – for our people, customers, investors, society and planet.*

title: Senior Optimization Engineer
description:
**⚡️ What We Do**
 Swiftly gaining ground as Sweden’s industry leader in battery storage and expanding rapidly in selected European markets, Flower is on a mission to enable the energy system of tomorrow.
   

  

 With an industry-leading AI-powered platform at its core, our service includes stabilizing the energy system by enhancing predictability and flexibility for both energy producers and consumers. By combining pioneering technology with a portfolio of flexible energy assets, we break new ground towards a fossil-free energy system, allowing clean energy to power society.
   

  

**🌟Who We Are**
 Tech company at heart – purpose in our DNA. Flower consists of a diverse group of innovative individuals with a strong desire to improve the state of the world.
   

  

 At Flower, we believe trust, collaboration and diversity are essential to not only create an inclusive work environment, but also drive career growth. By embracing varying perspectives, we allow creativity and progress to flourish.
   

  

 To accelerate towards our goal of becoming the pioneering force powering the energy system of tomorrow, we are now looking for a passionate and skilled Optimization Engineer.
   

  

**👩‍💻 About The Role**
 As a Senior Optimization Engineer, you will take a leading role in designing and advancing cutting-edge optimization models that drive the efficient allocation of Flower’s energy assets across diverse and dynamic markets. Beyond building robust and well-tested models, you will be expected to influence technical strategy, mentor peers, and ensure that our optimization systems are not only accurate and efficient but also scalable and future-proof.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Lead the design, implementation, and deployment of advanced mathematical optimization models to maximize efficiency and revenue across multiple energy markets.
* Drive architectural and technical decisions for optimization systems, ensuring robustness, scalability, and maintainability.
* Write, review, and maintain production-grade Python code, embedding optimization at the core while setting a high standard of engineering excellence.
* Design effective test strategies to validate optimization models ensuring reliability and performance under diverse market conditions.
* Proactively identify opportunities to improve model design, optimization approaches, and integration with other trading systems.
* Stay ahead of emerging trends in mathematical optimization, contributing innovative ideas and translating them into Flower’s roadmap.
* Mentor data scientists & engineers and provide thought leadership within the Asset Optimization domain and fostering a culture of technical excellence.


**Who You Are**
* Master’s or PhD in Operations Research, Computer Science, Industrial Engineering, Applied Mathematics, Engineering Physics, or a related quantitative field.
* 5+ years of professional experience developing and deploying production-grade optimization models in commercial or research settings.
* Proven expertise in applying advanced MILP optimization techniques to balance expressiveness of the formulation, robustness and model complexity
* Solid theoretical foundation and ability to translate mathematical concepts into practical, high-performance optimization systems.
* Strong proficiency in Python and experience developing production-quality optimization code within complex systems.
* Experience developing test methodologies for optimization solutions.
* Skilled communicator, able to present technical concepts with clarity to both technical and non-technical stakeholders, and influence decision-making.
* Hands-on experience with mathematical modeling libraries (e.g., Pyomo, SciPy, OR-Tools) and solvers (e.g., Gurobi, HiGHS, SCIP, CPLEX, GLPK).
* Bonus: prior exposure to energy markets, trading systems, or real-time optimization environments.


**📍 Location**
 Our beautiful office is located in the heart of Södermalm just a short walk from Slussen subway station. We encourage in-office collaboration but support a hybrid work model.
   

  

**✉️ Apply**
 Our corporate language is English, as we have about 30 nationalities in the office. We therefore appreciate it if you could submit your CV in English.
   

  

 Throughout the recruitment process you will meet with the People & Talent Partner, Head of Predictions and Optimization, VP of Engineering and our CEO.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 —-
   

  

*We kindly but firmly decline any engagement in recruitment assistance for our hiring processes. This includes partnership offers or the sale of recruitment tools.*

title: Senior Staff Engineer, Fintech
description:
**About Wolt**
 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

 Wolt is looking for a Senior Staff Engineer to join our Fintech group and help shape the future of our Fintech products and platforms. This is a high-impact role that goes beyond a single project: you’ll provide clarity, alignment, and technical leadership across multiple initiatives, ensuring our financial and compliance platforms scale reliably as Wolt continues to expand globally offering a broader set of financial products to Wolt customers and partners.
   

  

 This position will involve close collaboration with senior engineering and product leaders, compliance specialists, and business stakeholders. The role is about connecting the dots across teams and organisations, guiding technical direction, and making sure decisions and platforms remain consistent as we grow.
   

  

 While the primary focus will be on Fintech/Payments, the impact will extend across the company, influencing the Merchant, Courier, and Consumer domains, as well as compliance and accounting platforms.
   

  

 For this role, you can be based in our tech hub cities (Helsinki, Berlin, Stockholm, Tallinn) or work remotely anywhere in Finland, Germany, Sweden, or Estonia - with occasional travel to connect with colleagues.
   

  

 What you’ll be doing
   

  

* Drive the technical vision and architecture for Wolt’s global Fintech platforms, ensuring they are scalable, reliable, and compliant.
* Provide technical leadership across multiple teams and projects, bringing architectural consistency to complex, large-scale platforms.
* Partner with engineering and product leaders, as well as non-technical stakeholders, to align priorities and manage trade-offs.
* Contribute to end-user-facing financial and compliance platforms, ensuring consistency, accuracy, and robustness at scale.
* Lead large cross-team projects, guiding them from concept to rollout across multiple countries and time zones.
* Promote best engineering practices, mentor engineers across teams, and set the long-term technical direction.
* Act as a bridge between technical and non-technical colleagues, ensuring clarity and alignment across functions.
* Contribute to the technical roadmaps of Fintech platforms and products by facilitating and aligning with other senior engineers.


 Our humble expectations
   

  

 We’re looking for someone with a mix of deep technical expertise, system-level thinking, and excellent communication skills.
   

  

**Technical Expertise**
* Proven track record designing and scaling large distributed systems.
* Experience delivering production-grade systems with compliance or financial requirements (fintech background is a plus but not a must-have).
* Ability to adapt quickly to new technologies and languages; while many of our services are written in Kotlin and Go, we are looking for a language-agnostic. (Prior experience in Go is a big plus).
* Ability to dive in quickly into new domains and projects.
* Strong understanding of system architecture, scalability, and reliability.
* Familiarity with modern cloud-native tools and data systems (e.g., Kubernetes, Kafka,, MongoDB).


**Communication & Influence**
* Strong communicator with the ability to influence, align, and build consensus across diverse teams and stakeholders.
* Comfortable working in a global environment across multiple time zones
* Skilled at translating complex technical decisions into clear direction for technical and non-technical audiences.


 What we offer
   

  

 At Wolt, this role provides a rare opportunity to make a wide-reaching impact on systems that are critical to our global business. As a Senior Staff Engineer, you will help build financial and compliance platforms that support millions of merchants, couriers, and consumers across continents. The scope of work spans global initiatives with colleagues across continents, and involves solving technical and organizational challenges at the intersection of large-scale distributed systems and Fintech.
   

  

 Alongside the technical challenge, this role offers the chance to work closely with talented engineers and leaders, shaping Wolt’s engineering culture while also mentoring and influencing others.
   

  

 Next steps
   

  

 The position will be filled as soon as we find the right candidate so apply as soon as possible! The compensation consists of a monthly salary combined with DoorDash RSUs.
   

  

 Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
   

  

 We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

title: Senior IT Consultant - Stockholm | BCG Platinion
description:
Who We Are
   

  

 Do you want to turn the challenges of digitalization into the solutions of the future? Join BCG Platinion in tackling the core IT issues of leading global companies. Deploy customized platforms, architectures, strategies, and organizations to leverage the digital potential of our customers and drive true innovation, with state-of-the-art tools such as cloud computing, AI, blockchain, microservices, and containerization. Add your individual strengths to our unique team, always there to support you. Together with Boston Consulting Group and our clients, we turn digital visions into reality.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

 For our Stockholm office, we are looking for Senior IT Consultants to collaborate with colleagues from BCG Platinion and/or The Boston Consulting Group on national and international client projects! You will be independently structuring project modules and supporting junior project members. Together with our clients, you will develop superior IT strategies, concepts, and solutions actively and on site, applying your sound technical know-how, your understanding of business contexts, and your analytical and conceptual skills.
   

  

 What You'll Bring
   

  

**You can help us make a difference if you**
* completed a university degree in computer science, informatics, engineering, business or a related field with higher-than-average grades
* bring a minimum of four years relevant experience in IT consulting, in the course of which you ran transformation and implementation projects in terms of both strategy and operations
* have led project teams of more than three people
* know exactly what the buzzwords machine learning, cyber resilience, DevOps, agile, AI, and robotics mean
* are familiar with all the stages of development for successful IT organizations and IT processes.
* know exactly how to put together complex business cases
* feel particularly comfortable in interdisciplinary teams and global contexts and are flexible and willing to travel
* are on a fluent level of understanding and communicating complex topics in English


 Who You'll Work With
   

  

**Shape the world of tomorrow**
* Form the digital transformation of globally leading companies while maintaining a clear view of overall technical solutions and client circumstances
* Drive groundbreaking projects forward by using agile methods and modern approaches within the scope of strategic IT implementation for clients and by actively steering the relevant modules
* Smooth the path for tailored, future-oriented customer journeys based on precise analysis of the situation and with current market developments and trends such as machine learning in mind
* Design and optimize unique IT architectures within the framework of enterprise solution requirements, modern custom software developments, and sustainable digital solutions, including cyber resilience


 Additional info
   

  

**How To Grow With Us**
 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we nurture a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
   

  

*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*
*#BCGPlatinion*
 Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.
   

  

 BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

title: Backendutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Minst 3 års Systemvetenskaplig utbildning alternativt civilingenjör eller motsvarande akademisk utbildning
* Minst 5 års sammanlagd erfarenhet av backendutveckling med C# och .NET
* Erfarenhet av minst 2 tidigare uppdrag med C# och .NET i eventdrivna system
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Docker och Kubernetes från minst 1 projekt/uppdrag.
* Minst 2 års sammanlagd erfarenhet av testautomation (ex. enhetstester) och integrationstester


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av eventdriven arkitektur, till exempel Kafka, RedPanda eller liknande från minst 2 projekt/uppdrag.
* Erfarenhet av Scala och/eller java från minst 1 projekt/uppdrag.
* Infrastruktur som kod, terraform eller motsvarande från minst 1 projekt/uppdrag.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 20-01-2026
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.
